First, let's calculate the total distance Andrea has already traveled. Since she has completed $\frac{3}{7}$ of the trip's total distance of $168 \mathrm{~km}$, we can find this distance by multiplying $168 \mathrm{~km}$ by $\frac{3}{7}$:

\text{Distance traveled} = 168 \mathrm{~km} \times \frac{3}{7} = 72 \mathrm{~km}

$$
